projects.name: Code Health Refactoring v1.6.3.4-v4
projects.description: Comprehensive code health refactoring to improve CodeScene scores to 9+ for all main source files. Targets: background.js (6.79), state-manager.js (8.28), UICoordinator.js (8.41), content.js (8.55), window.js (8.72), settings.js (8.88). Focus on reducing cyclomatic complexity, eliminating code duplication, fixing Bumpy Road patterns, and resolving ESLint errors.

tasks.name: Refactor background.js - Score 6.79 to 9+
tasks.details: CRITICAL PRIORITY - Lowest score (6.79). CodeScene issues: Bumpy Road patterns in migrateContainersToUnifiedFormat and modifiedHeaders, Complex Methods (computeStateHash cc=14, _handleQuickTabStateChange cc=9, _updateGlobalStateFromStorage cc=9, modifiedHeaders cc=9, tryLoadFromSessionStorage cc=9), Complex Conditionals, Code Duplication. ESLint errors: unused imports, max-depth, require-await.

tasks.name: Refactor state-manager.js - Score 8.28 to 9+
tasks.details: Score 8.28. CodeScene issues: Complex Method (QuickTabStateManager.save cc=10), Code Duplication (pinTab/unpinTab, updatePosition/updateSize/removeTab similar patterns). Need to extract common patterns and reduce save method complexity.

tasks.name: Refactor UICoordinator.js - Score 8.41 to 9+
tasks.details: Score 8.41. CodeScene issues: Bumpy Road patterns (render, _restoreExistingWindow, reconcileRenderedTabs, _refreshAllRenderedTabs), Complex Methods (update cc=9, _tryApplyDimensionsFromInstance cc=9), Complex Conditionals, Excess Function Arguments (5-7 args). ESLint: complexity violation in _buildHydrationOptions.

tasks.name: Refactor content.js - Score 8.55 to 9+
tasks.details: Score 8.55. CodeScene issues: Complex Methods (handleCopyText cc=14, logQuickTabsInitError cc=10, setupHoverDetection.mouseover cc=9, _hasQuickTabParentStructure cc=9), Complex Conditionals. ESLint errors: import order, max-depth violations (many at level 3-4), arrow function complexity (cc=69), require-await warnings.

tasks.name: Refactor window.js - Score 8.72 to 9+
tasks.details: Score 8.72. CodeScene issues: Complex Methods (render cc=15, _pauseMediaInIframe cc=12), Large Method (render 180 LoC). ESLint: max-lines-per-function warning on render method (180 lines, max 70).

tasks.name: Refactor settings.js - Score 8.88 to 9+
tasks.details: Score 8.88. CodeScene issues: Bumpy Road (handlePrimaryTabSwitch), Complex Methods (gatherSettingsFromForm cc=13, _validateCollectedLogs cc=13, handlePrimaryTabSwitch cc=10).

tasks.name: Fix remaining ESLint errors across codebase
tasks.details: Fix remaining ESLint errors in popup.js (max-lines-per-function), rollup.config.js (import order), test files (import order, unused vars, no-prototype-builtins), shims/container-shim.js (require-await), storage/SyncStorageAdapter.js (require-await).

tasks.name: Update version and documentation
tasks.details: Update manifest.json version to 1.6.3.4-v4, update Copilot instructions and agent files with new patterns and changes from refactoring.
